name: Shah%27adrom%27illithyr
content:
Shah'adrom'illithyr, known as Hadro, was a male Chiss Aristocra of the Chiss Ascendancy living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he posted a Blacklist Bounty on a Trandoshan Pirate Reneget Vause, who have been wreaking havoc on the Chiss-occupied territory on Hoth. A bounty hunter took on the contract and received from Shah'adrom'illithyr directions to a White Maw prisoner held captive in the Dorn Base. After the hunter showed proof of Vause's death, he persuaded Shah'adrom'illithyr into letting the prisoner, Blizz go free and join his crew.
Aristocra Shah'adrom'illithyr appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission "Cool Reception" on Hoth and is voice acted by Christopher Neame.
